title: MSFS Just Dropped 3 Belated Presents for its 5-Year Anniversary! ğŸ
description:
Microsoft Flight Simulator is celebrating its fifth anniversary with a massive update, and it feels like Christmas came early! ğŸ 

In this video, we unwrap three major new gifts: Sim Update 3 (with huge performance fixes), the new Eurocopter EC135 helicopter, and the stunning new German cities in City Update 12.

Get ready to see:

The essential performance and stability improvements in Sim Update 3.

A detailed look at the new EC135, perfect for every pilot.

A scenic tour of beautiful, newly enhanced German cities!

Which of these "presents" are you most excited to fly first? Let me know in the comments! ğŸ‘‡ Don't forget to like and subscribe for more MSFS content. Happy flying!
